markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Samsaran](/Traits.aspx?ID=828)</title>

**Source** [Tian Xia Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=230) pg. 134

Blue-skinned people native to Zi Ha, who reincarnate upon death and recall pieces of their past lives.
name: Samsaran
